description:
Sense of humor. laugh. I like sports, nature, art, cultures. the music. Dance. I am an honest person. transparent. Sociable, as a Latin I am romantic, I like to give my beautiful energy, to show my affection. I love to show my beautiful heart to my partner. I like spending time with my partner. doing activities, spending time with family, friends. I am here to find something beautiful and special. A woman with a beautiful heart.
I'm not here to play games, lie, or other B.S.
